[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

SPECIAL RELIGIOUS EDUCATION AND TRAINING COURSES

(Religious Education for Women)

At Maarif-ul-Quran, women are taught Quran-e-Majeed with the rules of Tajweed. We also offer memorization (Hifz) programs for women. Tafseer and short Arabic grammar is also taught along with Nazra.

[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” disable_element=”yes” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1617819748953{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-1.png?id=541) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334955491{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609443539078{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]The institute has also arranged religious education for women:

  • Qur’an is taught according to rules of Tajweed.
  • Basic religious education is provided, in order to live according to the Sunnah of Prophet (Peace Be Upon Him).
  • Translation of the Quran is taught with its exegesis.
  • Women memorize specific Surahs of the Holy Quran whose virtues are mentioned in the Hadith. E.g.: Surah Yaseen, Surah Mulk, & Surah Waqiyah etc.
  • Along with these matters, many women have also started memorizing the Holy Quran.
  •  

Duration: 4 days in a week (Mon, Tues, Wed, Thurs) from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”14900″ Other Courses

The institute has also arranged religious education for women.

[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609116831363{margin-left: 10px !important;}”]
Qur’an is taught according to rules of Tajweed.
Women memorize specific Surahs of the Holy Quran whose virtues are mentioned in the Hadith. E.g.: Surah Yaseen, Surah Mulk, & Surah Waqiyah etc.
Along with these matters, many women have also started memorizing the Holy Quran.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609118174473{background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/aims-and-objectives-web.png?id=12794) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″]
Translation of the Quran is taught with its exegesis.
Basic religious education is provided, in order to live according to the Sunnah of Prophet (Peace Be Upon Him).
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Timings: 4 days in a week (Mon, Tues, Wed, Thurs) from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.
